name: 黃儀婷
objective: This course aims to develop the ability of students to meet specific sensory needs through the creation of abstract visual order in the form of two-dimension and three-dimension. The visual organization of design elements including line, plane, volume, and the analysis of their abstract relationships and principles of order are studied.
schedule:
Week 1 Grouping and course introduction
week 2  Topic/Project orientation; group discussion
week 3 Group discussion
week 4 Group discussion
week 5 First evaluation
week 6 Group discussion
week 7 Group discussion
week 8 Group discussion
week 9 group discussion
week 10 group discussion
week 11 group discussion
week 12 Second evaluation
week 13 group discussion
week 14 group discussion
week 15 group discussion
week 16 group discussion
week 17 group discussion
week 18 overall comments
scorePolicy: 20% for the first evaluation; 30% for the second evaluation; 30% for the overall evaluation; 20% for the usual grade
